### getFrame() {#a5c0fe9a7501407a8fffcf163b35998bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const DILineInfo &amp; llvm::DIInliningInfo::getFrame (unsigned Index) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the frame at <code>Index</code>.

Frames are stored in bottom-up (leaf-to-root) order with increasing index.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/dicontext-h/#l00102">102</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/dicontext-h">DIContext.h</a>.
